name: ROB n ROLL
description:
*** ROB n ROLL IS NOW FREE to celebrate the iPhone5 update! *** Don't miss out and get it today.

Sprint, sneak, and hide in this challenging game of cat & mouse. Many challenging levels put you in the tiny shoes of our anti-hero Rob.
He's the ultimate anti-cat burglar and the world’s most famous hamster thief. To top it all off, he's a charmer, so ladies beware!

Our number one goal when creating ROB n ROLL was to deliver amazing and addictive game play. The game is intuitive and reactive and will give both your reflexes and your mind a work out.

ROB n ROLL highlights:
• Challenging maze levels.
• When the going gets tough, the Super Fireball helps get things back on track.
• A new spin on the tilt-based game.
• Colorful and top quality artwork.
• Compare your result with friends and foes in the Game Center.

Testimonials don't lie, read some of the reviews :)

"Great visual graphic + funny animation. Intuitive control and perfect calibration system."
by Gamesaku.com

"Great game! A fun title with unlimited replay value!"
by iReviewT.com

"Classic cartoon-type graphics, nice soundtrack, fast-paced action, excellent lead character, ridiculous premise; what's not to love?"
by LangloPhile

"My children were squealing with excitement playing this! Great job on the game! Definitely worth the 99 cents!"
